title: ‘Good work Pakistan’: President on first T20 win
content:
ISLAMABAD, Feb 11 (APP): As Pakistan beat South Africa in the first T20 match, President Dr Arif Alvi appreciated the Green Shirts for exhibiting a good game.
“Good work Pakistan. Green Shirts you win in a good contest,” he said on Twitter following a thrilling match played at Lahore’s Gaddafi Stadium.
Good work Pakistan. Green shirts you win in a good contest. Excellent batting by Rizwan for his T-20 ton following up immediately after his test century.
— Dr. Arif Alvi (@ArifAlvi) February 11, 2021
The president particularly lauded Pakistani wicket-keeper Muhammad Rizwan for his T20 ton immediately after his Test century.
